summary: Because of his undying love for acorns, Scrat makes an astounding discovery that sends him deep into the black and endless space; however, his actions have consequences of cosmic proportions. Will he stay forever stranded in the void?
director: Directors: Mike Thurmeier (as Michael Thurmeier), Galen T. Chu (co-director) (as Galen Chu)
title: Scrat-Tástrofe Cósmica
